inscription: {Kaze o itami / iwa utsu nami no / onore nomi / kudake te mono o / omou koro kana} (As wind-driven waves / break on a rock into spray, / so my love and happiness / are scattered / by your refusal.)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of Thirty-six Poetic Immortals (Sanjūrokkasen 三十六歌仙)
provenance: Louis V. Ledoux (until 1948); Roland Koscherak (around 1948); Richard P. Gale (until 1974)
title: Poem by Minamoto no Shigeyuki
